document_data.name: ''Wand of Healing''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Wands of healing''''' were enchanted rods that provided spellcasters with healing at a time of need.
document_data.Description: ''Wands of healing'' that dated back to the preâ€“[[Weeping War]] [[Myth Drannor]] were usually crafted out of driftwood that was shaped into a rod or a wand and polished.
document_data.Powers: ''Wands of healing'' allowed their wielders to cast the ''[[cure light wounds]]'' spell. An average ''wand'' came with twenty-four charges of the spell.
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], multiple ''wands of healing'' could be found in the ruins of Myth Drannor. These wands could be found in possession of various [[undead]] creatures that once were healers of the ancient elven city. One owner of a ''wand of healing'' was the [[orc]] chieftain [[Zud]] whose tribe made their home in the [[Dwarven Dungeons]] under the City of Song.
